title: [國際戰線]  香港/美國司機撞人嘅分別，有無得講?

replies.msg:
When you get run over by a driver , what would happen in HK & USA ?

美國示威｜貨車高速撞向人群　司機被扯落車「私了」【短片】
https://news.mingpao.com/ins/%e5%9c%8b%e9%9a%9b/article/20200601/s00005/1590986314505

In USA , police arrest the driver for running the truck into the protesting crowds.


【抗暴之戰】撞人的士司機未被追究 反獲撐警組織捐52萬
https://hk.appledaily.com/local/20191009/YJHW7QPFXUUJZKAMT45HO6AQUI

In HK ,police arrest the protester who was ran down by the driver and got a broken among with other protesters for rioting and hurting the driver.

The driver is free to go without charges and being rewarded for 530k HKD from pro-Beijing and police-supporting parties for the "heroic act" .





有無得打國際線??
不過要高手制 memes 同英文版新聞
